title: Couple With Heart Man No Skin Tone Man Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Two Men Holding Hands With Heart
description: Represents a romantic couple composed of two men, one with a default skin tone and the other with a light skin tone, united by a heart symbol. It signifies love, partnership, and commitment between two men.
apple_vendor_description: The couple with a heart emoji, featuring a man with no skin tone and a man with light skin tone on Apple devices, showcases a tender embrace with a bright, gleaming heart suspended above them. Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy finish and realistic lighting make the figures and the heart appear smooth and inviting, highlighting their connection. This emoji, with its clear representation of love and partnership, is a beautiful way to express romantic commitment, a strong male bond, or mutual adoration in messages exchanged on Apple devices.
